name: SelectValuePrimitive
description: Displays the currently selected value or placeholder. Renders a `<span>` element.

props.name: children
props.description: Accepts a function that returns a `ReactNode` to format the selected value.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: placeholder
props.description:
The placeholder value to display when no value is selected.
This is overridden by `children` if specified, or by a null item's label in `items`.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
